channel.title: Vps problems
channel.description:
Okay... My problem is that i can't host my server on vps. When i type: sh run.sh in putty i get:
Ghostscape is Online. ../../Config/Npc.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Npcdrops.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Autospawn.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Item.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Globaldrops.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Doors.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Shops.cfg: file not found.
I can log in to my server but there's nothing around. I mean no npc's, no object's... Because it can't find .cfg's.

item.title: Vps problems
item.dc:creator: @icepkers icepkers
item.description:
@icepkers wrote:

ghostscape is gay, If you really like it talk to the owner: wwe justin

item.title: Vps problems
item.dc:creator: @amfibija amfibija
item.description:
@amfibija wrote:

Okay… My problem is that i can’t host my server on vps. When i type: sh run.sh in putty i get:

Ghostscape is Online.
…/…/Config/Npc.cfg: file not found.
…/…/Config/Npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
…/…/Config/Autospawn.cfg: file not found.
…/…/Config/Item.cfg: file not found.
…/…/Config/Globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
…/…/Config/Doors.cfg: file not found.
…/…/Config/Shops.cfg: file not found.

I can log in to my server but there’s nothing around. I mean no npc’s, no object’s… Because it can’t find .cfg’s.
